title: Global Day of Coderetreat 2015 - Johannesburg, South Africa
description:
Come and join us on the Global Day of Code Retreat at the lovely Helderfontein Conference Center in Fourways. This CodeRetreat will be a special event as it will be run side by side with a MobRetreat. 
It doesn't matter if you are a novice or a pro, everyone is welcome here and there will be lots to learn and share. We are in the process of setting up the Meetup event to RSVP for the event 
http://www.meetup.com/coderetreat/events/225900681/
